tool_description: Get motivational quotes and motivational pictures.
title: Motivational Content

api_list.name: Get a Specific Quote
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches a specific quote using the provided 'id'.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motivational-content.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motivational-content.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Motivational Quotes
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches all the motivational quotes. However, you can do pagination as well using the 'skip' and 'limit' parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motivational-content.p.rapidapi.com/quotes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motivational-content.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a Specific Picture
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches a specific motivational picture according to the given id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motivational-content.p.rapidapi.com/pics/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motivational-content.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Motivational Pictures
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches all the pictures. However, you can use 'skip' and 'limit' parameters to do pagination.
api_list.code:
